sections.title: Transaction Failure Reasons
examples: A gaming transaction may fail if MCC is restricted by issuer.
notes: Enable international online transactions in app settings if needed.

sections.title: Refund Timelines
rules: Refund appears 2–7 working days after merchant settlement.
examples: A cancelled Swiggy order refund usually appears within 2–3 days.
notes: Refund does not count as payment towards statement due.
